meta.name: The Midnight Atelier
meta.subtitle: Snatched silhouettes. Midnight silk. A wardrobe for the wardrobe.
meta.tagline: Step through the fur coats into something darker.
meta.hero_quote: I have been searching for the stars, and I have found them in your eyes.
meta.footer_message: For nights that turn into mornings.

products.name: Frankie Silk Dress
products.description: Slinky silk charmeuse with smocked back for comfort. Slim fitting, ankle length with spaghetti straps. Sustainably made in Los Angeles. The dress that makes entrances.

products.name: Fete Slip Dress
products.description: With a crinkle effect and subtle shine, this festive dress is designed to be your style guide all season long. Less cling than the Cleo, great in any styling situation.

products.name: Shon Wool Pant
products.description: Mid-rise, relaxed fit barrel leg pant with uniquely curved silhouette. Seam detail at knees. Made in USA from 100% virgin wool. The pant that makes you walk differently.

products.name: Slim Evening Trousers
products.description: Pared-back and tailored Stockholm minimalism. Slim evening trousers in seasonal wool. The kind of pants that make you stand up straighter.

products.name: Hangisi 70 Satin Pump
products.description: The shoe that launched a thousand proposals. Navy blue satin with crystal buckle. 70mm heel for walkable elegance. The one Carrie wore. The one you'll keep forever.

products.description: The bestselling ballet flat that mixes classic elegance with unparalleled comfort. Handmade in Spain. The shoe Vogue is 'obsessed' with. 1,400+ reviews.

products.name: Mini T-Lock Leather Clutch
products.description: The house icon in miniature. Meticulously handcrafted leather clutch with the signature T-Lock closure. Big enough for the essentials, small enough to dance.

products.name: Grand Cygnet Gold Ring
products.description: A reimagining of the classic signet ring. Hugs you close, like a cygnet in its mother's wings. 100% recycled 14k solid gold. Made in their Brooklyn studio. Engravable.
products.expected_content: gold signet ring Catbird recycled 14k cygnet
